DOC.brief_summary: Study clinical study assess effect oral tadalafil 10mg 20 mg psychosocial aspect quality life erectile dysfunction patient compare tadalafil previous oral erectile dysfunction medication . Study period 13 week . Study patient fill quality life questionnaire treatment satisfaction questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Tadalafil Quality Life Sexual Life Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: history erectile dysfunction ( defined consistent change quality erection adversely affect patient 's satisfaction sexual intercourse ) least 3 month duration use oral prescription medication , tadalafil , erectile dysfunction minimum period 3 month visit 1 respond previous erectile dysfunction medication assess investigator exhibit evidence clinically significant hepatobiliary disease ( include jaundice ) visit 1 cardiovascular exclusion criterion : history chronic stable angina treat nitrate , recent acute cardiovascular event procedure ( myocardial infarction , coronary intervention , stroke , etc . ) , history serious cardiovascular event ( e.g . arrhythmia , sudden cardiac arrest , congestive heart failure , etc . ) , systolic blood pressure < 90mmHg diastolic blood pressure < 50mmHg screen receive treatment cancer chemotherapy
